programme.title: World's Most Dangerous Roads

programme.title: Top Gear

programme.title: Ghosts

programme.title: Ghosts

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Gone Gone: Shocking news rocks Button House and a booking mix-up sees Mike and Alison forced to host an impromptu - and ill-prepared - children's birthday party.

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Poached Guests: A neighbour of Alison and Mike's spots a business opportunity which sparks an all-out war between them, and the ghosts find a surprising new friend.

programme.title: Ghosts

programme.desc: Gem Fest. The annual Gemfields Festival is approaching, and Todd and Bri are madly stockpiling gems. The Mifsuds undertake yet another massive maintenance job. S2, Ep4

programme.title: Gem Hunters Down Under
programme.desc: Necessity Is The Mother Of... Ray takes on the job of bashing and sawing through his biggest rough stones. The Bushies reckon they've finally hit payday. But is it wishful thinking? S2, Ep5

programme.title: Gem Hunters Down Under
programme.desc: The End Of The Road. Anthony goes back to school, learning to cut gems, while Jodie enjoys the peace as she digs alone. The Richardsons dig deep at the old Rabbi Claim. S2, Ep6

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: The Dirt Dogs take on the biggest gamble of their career, and the Gold Gypsies tear into an all-or-nothing final mission. Meanwhile Rick digs deep to save his season. S2, Ep9

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: The Dirt Dogs go to Kalgoorlie to process the gold from their Heap Leach. Meanwhile, Ted and Lecky's daughter, model and jewellery designer Tyler, joins their hunt for pay dirt. S2, Ep10

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: The Dirt Dogs invest in a hard rock mining plant. And, the Gold Gypsies are eager to be back in the field, but a $20,000 excavator repair is a tough start to the season. S4, Ep1

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Twenty of Everything. Gary's house is so full that he is forced to sleep outside on a makeshift bed. With the city now threatening eviction, can he see sense in time? S4, Ep6

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Hoo, This Reeks! Kathy's extreme hoarding forced her 12-year-old son to move out of their home. Now she must make a drastic change or risk losing her son forever. S4, Ep7

programme.title: Jack and Kelly Osbourne: Night of Terror
programme.desc: Jack and Kelly Osbourne set out on a terrifying three-day investigation of the Queen Mary. What will they encounter on the infamously haunted ocean liner? S1, Ep1

programme.title: Unexplained: Caught On Camera
programme.desc: Secret Room. In Massachusetts, Zack discovers a secret room which is full of deadly surprises. And, an urban explorer spends the night in a house of horrors. S3, Ep1

programme.title: Unexplained: Caught On Camera
programme.desc: Prison Possession. At a notorious prison, a demonic spirit takes hold of an amateur ghost hunter. Plus, a creepy doll threatens to burn the house down at any opportunity. S3, Ep3

programme.title: Baggage Battles
programme.desc: Lady Luck. The baggage battlers head to an esteemed estate sale in St. Paul, where they bid on items ranging from automotive parts and a rare doll to a hockey mascot costume. S3, Ep3

programme.title: Baggage Battles

programme.desc: Turbos And Tailgates. Andy loves a crazy car concept, turning an old ambulance into a Maryland sports-mobile. Then, he thinks outside the box to soup-up a car for his buddy in blue. S3, Ep9

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Two For The Road. Andy calls in help to get his 1932 Roadster up and running. Another project faces problems - combining parts from two Chevy trucks into a single 'FrankenTruck.' S3, Ep10

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Crushing Cars And Taking Names. Andy's yard sees some unusual additions. There's an iconic piece of military history, and a dinosaur-sized bulldozer that no one knows what to do with. S3, Ep11

programme.title: Junkyard Empire

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead...
programme.desc: ...Reckoning: (2023) Tom Cruise returns as Ethan Hunt and jumps a motorbike off a mountain for real. There's some stuff about an all-powerful AI. But it's the thrills that we're here for!

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: (2011) Naughty kids are one thing but a naughty teacher? Can titular educator Cameron Diaz win a big-bucks teaching competition... and buy surgical enhancements to seduce Justin Timberlake?

programme.title: Late Night with the Devil
programme.desc: (2023) Unsettling found-footage horror with David Dastmalchian. A has-been host tries to save his 70s talk show using a demonically possessed 13-year-old girl. Really, what could go wrong?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: It Came from Outer Space
programme.desc: (1953) Richard Carlson stars as an astronomer who sees an alien craft land. But nobody believes him - until the cloning starts in Jack Arnold's science-fiction classic.

programme.title: Fantastic Voyage
programme.desc: (1966) Classic sci-fi adventure. Raquel Welch and Donald Pleasence are among the crew of a miniaturised submarine that's injected into an injured diplomat's body in a bid to save his life.

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny
programme.desc: (1954) Oscar-nominated Humphrey Bogart, in one of his finest roles, stars in Edward Dmytryk's gripping drama as Captain Philip Queeg, in charge of a US Navy minesweeper during the war.

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: (1951) Second World War thriller. Richard Widmark, Dana Andrews and Robert Wagner star as divers with a special underwater demolition team taking the war to the Japanese in the Pacific.

programme.title: Jerry & Marge Go Large
programme.desc: (2022) Fact-based comedy starring Bryan Cranston and Annette Bening as a retired couple who find a way to exploit a lottery loophole. But then some rich kids try to muscle in...

programme.title: LA Confidential
programme.desc: (1997) Curtis Hanson's thriller of cops and corruption set in 1950s LA - with Kevin Spacey, Guy Pearce, Russell Crowe and Kim Basinger. Based on James Ellroy's detective novel.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: (2019) Quentin Tarantino's darkly comic drama set in 60s LA, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Brad Pitt and Margot Robbie. A failing actor's world collides with the Manson Family.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: (1995) Charming family comedy-drama about a clever little pig who forms a close bond with a farmer and discovers a talent for herding sheep. With James Cromwell.

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: (1998) Charming family comedy sequel. The farm's in trouble and only a sheep-herding pig can save the day. But after a customs mix-up, Babe ends up in a boarding house for lost animals...

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence...
programme.desc: ...Interview Special: Director Roland Emmerich and stars Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Charlotte Gainsbourg talk about making the sci-fi sequel Independence Day: Resurgence.

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: (2018) Feel-good British family comedy. Sarah's (Beattie Edmondson) chaotic life gets even more complicated when she inherits a naughty pug from her nan.

programme.title: My Spy
programme.desc: (2020) Family action comedy. A CIA agent (Dave Bautista) gets the run-around from a nine-year-old girl when he's sent to keep an eye on her family. With Chloe Coleman.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence...
programme.desc: ...Interview Special: Director Roland Emmerich and stars Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Charlotte Gainsbourg talk about making the sci-fi sequel Independence Day: Resurgence.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: (2016) Sci-fi blockbuster sequel starring Jeff Goldblum. Twenty years after Earth repelled a devastating alien invasion, the extraterrestrials return to finish the job.

programme.title: Peppermint
programme.desc: (2018) Revenge thriller with Jennifer Garner. A mum turns vigilante on a quest for justice when her husband and daughter are murdered by a drug cartel.

programme.title: Stand by Me
programme.desc: (1986) Four young friends (Wil Wheaton, River Phoenix, Corey Feldman, Jerry O'Connell) set out on an expedition into deepest Oregon in this coming-of-age tale based on a Stephen King story.

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: (2018) Ryan Reynolds returns as the potty-mouthed, can of whup-ass-opening superhero and now he's got buddies to help him take on baddie Josh Brolin in the all-out action comedy sequel.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
programme.desc: (1973) Can Sinbad stop a master magician from reaching the Fountain of Destiny on the lost land of Lemuria and being crowned the new leader of Marabia?

programme.title: Stormbreaker
programme.desc: (2006) Family action-thriller with Alex Pettyfer and Mickey Rourke. British intelligence recruit a schoolboy to take on the man who killed his dad and is planning to unleash a deadly virus.

programme.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
programme.desc: (2019) Touching comedy-drama. An ageing golden retriever (voiced by Kevin Costner) tells the story of his life with his best pal, a budding Formula 1 driver.

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: (1989) Comedy-thriller starring Tom Hanks. A cop investigates a murder to which there's just one witness: Hooch, a slobbering, beer-drinking French mastiff, who now needs 24/7 protection.

programme.title: See How They Run
programme.desc: (2022) Sam Rockwell and Saoirse Ronan head a splendid ensemble for this comedy whodunnit that places a real murder among a production of Agatha Christie's The Mousetrap. With Adrien Brody.

programme.title: Assassin Club
programme.desc: (2023) Action with Henry Golding and Sam Neill. An assassin wants to retire for love, but his handler has entered him into a deadly game of hit the hitman. Can he survive to live his dream?

programme.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
programme.desc: (2018) Action comedy starring Mila Kunis and Kate McKinnon. Two friends become embroiled in espionage after one of them gets dumped by a man she didn't even know was a spy. Surprise!

programme.desc: ...Reckoning: (2023) Tom Cruise returns as Ethan Hunt and jumps a motorbike off a mountain for real. There's some stuff about an all-powerful AI. But it's the thrills that we're here for!

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: (2011) Naughty kids are one thing but a naughty teacher? Can titular educator Cameron Diaz win a big-bucks teaching competition... and buy surgical enhancements to seduce Justin Timberlake?

programme.title: Late Night with the Devil
programme.desc: (2023) Unsettling found-footage horror with David Dastmalchian. A has-been host tries to save his 70s talk show using a demonically possessed 13-year-old girl. Really, what could go wrong?

programme.title: Fantastic Voyage
programme.desc: (1966) Classic sci-fi adventure. Raquel Welch and Donald Pleasence are among the crew of a miniaturised submarine that's injected into an injured diplomat's body in a bid to save his life.

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny
programme.desc: (1954) Oscar-nominated Humphrey Bogart, in one of his finest roles, stars in Edward Dmytryk's gripping drama as Captain Philip Queeg, in charge of a US Navy minesweeper during the war.

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: (1951) Second World War thriller. Richard Widmark, Dana Andrews and Robert Wagner star as divers with a special underwater demolition team taking the war to the Japanese in the Pacific.

programme.title: Jerry & Marge Go Large
programme.desc: (2022) Fact-based comedy starring Bryan Cranston and Annette Bening as a retired couple who find a way to exploit a lottery loophole. But then some rich kids try to muscle in...

programme.title: LA Confidential
programme.desc: (1997) Curtis Hanson's thriller of cops and corruption set in 1950s LA - with Kevin Spacey, Guy Pearce, Russell Crowe and Kim Basinger. Based on James Ellroy's detective novel.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: (2019) Quentin Tarantino's darkly comic drama set in 60s LA, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Brad Pitt and Margot Robbie. A failing actor's world collides with the Manson Family.

programme.desc: A look back at Sir David Attenborough's incredible life and career in broadcasting, including his youth as a fossil hunter and his pioneering use of technologies such as 3D and 4K.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Survival: In this concluding episode, Sir David Attenborough tries to understand what the next few decades may hold in store for the Reef. (3 of 3)

programme.title: David Attenborough's Wild City

programme.title: Elvis Presley: The Early Years
programme.desc: Uncover Elvis Presley's journey from Tupelo's poverty to worldwide fame.

programme.title: Rob & Romesh Vs Drag
